Title: Executioners
Legend: These skull-masked killers are the most feared warriors of the Darkling Covens. True virtuosos of slaughter, they have mastered the art of severing heads with every swing of their curved Executioner’s Draichs.
Intro: Each model in an Executioners unit is armed with an Executioner’s Draich.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Thrall Warhost

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Lordling. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic ofthat model’s melee weapons.

Rules.Name: Standard Bearer
Rules.Rule: STANDARD BEARER: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Standard Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit while it includes any Standard Bearers.

Rules.Name: Musician
Rules.Rule: MUSICIAN: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Drummer. Add 1 to charge rolls for this unit while it includes any Drummers.

Rules.Name: Severing Strike
Rules.Fluff: Heads roll and crimson arcs of hot blood spurt into the air as these warriors swing their deadly blades.
Rules.Rule: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with an Executioner’s Draich is 6, that attack causes 2 mortal wounds to the target and the attack sequence ends.
